source.name: Colorado Plateau Rapid Ecoregion Assessment Management Question E4: Where is fire adverse to ecological communities, features, and resources of concern?
source.description: This map shows areas where fire may potentially be adverse to ecological communities.  These areas are based on systems with historically longer fire frequency where invasive vegetation or uncharacteristic native vegetation occur.
